headline: Brazil extends Nike kit deal to 2038 and it's worth $100 million per year, AP source says
summary: Brazil soccer extended its kit deal with Nike by 12 years to 2038 on Friday.  A person familiar with the agreement told The Associated Press it was worth $100 million per year, plus royalties on the sale of national team shirts which were not included in previous contracts.  “This contract shows the strength of Brazilian soccer,” CBF president Ednaldo Rodrigues said.

headline: Sam McCracken, Founder of Nike’s Native American-Focused N7 Business, to Retire in 2025
summary: "To all of you who have trusted me to do the work that I was called to do, thank you," McCracken wrote on LinkedIn announcing his plans to retire.
